mapper.update:
UPDATE standard_product_unit_record
standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId},
product_serial_number = #{productSerialNumber},
brand_id = #{brandId},
category_tree_node_id = #{categoryTreeNodeId},
title = #{title},
name = #{name},
chinese_name = #{chineseName},
market_price = #{marketPrice},
tax_no = #{taxNo},
ean_no = #{eanNo},
place_of_origin = #{placeOfOrigin},
calculation_unit = #{calculationUnit},
status = #{status},
is_available = #{isAvailable},
product_details = #{productDetails},
create_userid = #{createUserid},
create_username = #{createUsername},
create_userip = #{createUserip},
create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
